title: Ayurvedic Meditations for Beginners
author: Better Mindfulness Meditation; Gia George
description: Check out this great listen on Audible.com. Would you like to experience more calm and blissful energy in your life? In modern society, we have become so accustomed to being in a hurry that we have nearly forgotten how to sit still and just "be". We rush all over the place, rarel...

Listeners also enjoyed... - Hypnosis for Anxiety and Depression - Quiet the Mind, Beat Stress, and Rewire the Brain for Happiness with Guided Hypnotherapy Meditation - By: Better Mindfulness Meditation - Narrated by: Loula Taylor - Length: 3 hrs and 1 min - Original Recording - Overall - Performance - Story Tired of anxiety and stress running your life? Ever find yourself overthinking a situation so much that it begins to negatively impact your mood and energy? Anxiety, depression, and stress can suck the joy out of living and cause long term health problems if left alone. The amygdala is your brain's "fight or flight" fear center. It is responsible for triggering anxiety and chronic stress. Recent studies in neuroplasticity have revealed that meditation practice can actually cause the amygdala to shrink. Literally rewiring your brain for relaxation. - - I can't emphasize enough on how clear this is - By Big Sauce on 08-17-20 - Chakra Awakening - Guided Meditation to Increase Your Chakra's Energy, Balancing and Healing Power, Open Your Third Eye, Light Up Your Spirit and Awaken the Joy Hidden Inside You - By: Kristin Plain - Narrated by: Dona Jackson - Length: 5 hrs and 3 mins - Unabridged - Overall - Performance - Story Awaken your chakras to heal yourself and live in harmony - here's how! Meditation heals and sharpens your focus. It is an effective alternate therapy against high blood pressure, cardiovascular diseases, and chronic pain. It is one of the most lethal weapons for combating stress, anxiety, depression, nervousness, and panic. In You're All You Need, we have it all decoded for your benefit. Then understanding the principle and practice of the 7 Chakras is your best solution to all daily life problems like anxiety, depression, stress, mental fatigue, insecurity, and so on. This book will walk you through the process of opening your third eye, so that you can access all it has to offer. By: [Sandra Lopez](/search?searchAuthor=Sandra+Lopez&ref=a_pd_Ayurve_c5_adblp13npsbx_3_3_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=MXVKDJC3PF3F8C3PRQPW&pageLoadId=HzQmD1TaRWLMWyoR&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1) - Guided Meditation for Insomnia, Anxiety and Stress Relief - Heal Yourself with Deep Hypnosis Relaxation, Learn to Let Go and Get a Great Nights Sleep - By: Miss Mindfulness - Narrated by: Tamme Buckner - Length: 2 hrs - Original Recording - Overall - Performance - Story Do you always feel stressed? Are you always anxious about the future? Do you feel like your brain never turns off? Stop right there. Take a second and take a deep breath. We are about to embark on a life-changing journey. When it comes to relaxing and resting the body, most people do this quite well. However, when it comes to relaxing the mind, many individuals struggle and cannot seem to give the mind the relaxation it needs. By: [Mindfulness Lodge](/author/Mindfulness-Lodge/B093GN8BXT?ref=a_pd_Ayurve_c5_adblp13npsbx_3_6_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=MXVKDJC3PF3F8C3PRQPW&pageLoadId=HzQmD1TaRWLMWyoR&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1), and others Publisher's summary Would you like to experience more calm and blissful energy in your life? In modern society, we have become so accustomed to being in a hurry that we have nearly forgotten how to sit still and just "be". We rush all over the place, rarely slowing down to contemplate or reflect. When we're busy all the time, it's easy to forget how to take a break. Ayurveda was established in ancient India over as a comprehensive science of medicine. In Ayurveda, everything and everyone on the planet is seen as interconnected. Three doshas or constitutions in Ayurveda are vata (air), pitta (fire), and kapha (earth). All three of these energies are present in every human body and mind, though most people are dominant in one or two of the doshas. Each of the three meditations in this audiobook is 20 minutes long. All are designed to work with your specific dosha. There are three different soothing background audio track options which allow you to customize the experience to your preference. By listening to Ayurvedic Meditation for Beginners, you will: - Learn the basic principles of the ancient science of Ayurvedic healing - Find out which dosha or doshas are most dominant for you - Observe the way your thoughts and feelings change from moment to moment - Learn how to relax into the present moment - Be able to think more clearly and creatively - Connect with and balance the chakra energy centers in your body - And much more.... Whether you're brand new to Ayurveda or an experienced spiritual practitioner, these Ayurvedic meditations are an amazing way to heighten your energy level and expand your consciousness. Don't hesitate! Get your copy today.
